extendedInfo.description: 3D battle ship fighting and 3D fishing, in one!Discover and conquer 24 areas with over 200 islands in this first campaign. Set sail with your pirate ship and enjoy epic battles! Earn coins by taking rest from battle while fishing and selling fish to your conquered island. Discover treasure islands to get golden treasure. Destroy and rob pirate and trade ships and sell stolen goods to you islands to earn some coins. Buy new stronger and faster ships while you advance. You can buy and upgrade cannons for 26 available ships and boats at the market.More campaigns comming soon.FEATURES:* Cartoon like real time 3D game* Conquer 24 areas with over 200 islands* Buy 26 different upgradable pirate ships and boats* Destroy over 1800 enemies* Discover treasure* 3D fishing* Good tablet supportREQUIREMENTS:* Android 2.1PERMISSIONS:* Internet and access network state - for ads* Vibration

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: This is a pretty cool game. But it could be A LOT better . Great start tho c:
reviews.author: Ty Williams

reviews.title: great concept and fun play, however..
reviews.comment: i think there needs to be a crew count on vessels and a way of boarding and capturing ships. perhaps a mini game to influence how effective your crew is in boarding.  also the ability to attack and raid ports would add some variety to the naval combat aspect of the game, along with missions like bounty, escort, raid.    two campaign modes would be cool as well, like a economic mode where you advance after earning so much loot. another interesting idea for a mini game mode would be a survival mode where you battle groups of different ships until you die and have high scores to post via social media.     this is a fun game has given me hours of enjoyment as it is, anyone looking for a fun naval combat game should try this.
reviews.author: Devin Morales

reviews.title: Overall good!
reviews.comment: Addicting but could use a touch  up on graphics. Love to waste waiting time playing this game
reviews.author: Jeff Watkin

reviews.title: Angad
reviews.comment: amazing...sea surfing game...great time pass...:-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun times
reviews.comment: Good game controls a lil sluggish but hey ur driving a boat, thing can\'t turn on a dime
reviews.author: Marcus Jay

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: I will love this game when I can buy and sell goods in ports, charge and board ships, visit a dirty pirate inn or two, etc. For now I love the way battles are played and all the little things in the game that are done right that would be so much better when interactive features of the game get a little more flushed out. Let us do more on islands than find gold people will be crazy addicted to this. Now I am mildly-sane addicted. Hope to be full blown crazy for this game in the future.
reviews.author: Joe Prusha

reviews.title: Surprisingly fun little game
reviews.comment: Obviously not going to be a AAA experience, but I was quite impressed by this game.  Could use a little more variety and less grinding (maybe partially randomize the enemy ships and increase variability in loot amounts), but a strong entry.
reviews.author: Trevor Adams

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.comment: All in all a good game, however there needs to be more ways to gain gold and xp, because doing the same thing over and over again just to get from level 5 to 8 is a little tedious. If you could add a couple more ways to liven it up a little it will make a good game even better.
reviews.author: Kieran Larkin

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy y
reviews.comment: I love it,i\'m totaly addicted,i\'d recommend it to anyone !! :-)

reviews.comment: Fun fun fun... Controls a little iffy, but that\'s probably just my arthritic thumb
